detaileddescription.para:
This array is used to storages built in indexes for coded nodes.
values The elements from ErrNodesTimeoutMonitor ErrGetNumOfCodedNodesOnBus ErrGetBillIndexFromErrCodedNodesArr ErrHdlListNodeCodingUpdate ErrHdlCodingUpdate ErrClearErrCodedNodes unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

detaileddescription.para: This function returns node timeout treshold value.

simplesect.para: reentrant No context {task, ErrCanGlobalTimeoutMonitor, ErrSetCanGlobalTimeoutDEMCond, ErrSetCanGlobalTimeoutDEMCond} thread safe yes multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous

simplesect.title: Security Relevance
simplesect.para: Not Security-Relevant.

parameterdescription.para: TComChannel Channel - Com channel. Provide channel Id to be checked.
uint16 BillIndex : Built in list index.

simplesect.para:
uint32 TreshValue : Node timeout treshold value.
15s : If it is a Vlan channel.
2.5s : If it is a CAN channel.
20s : If node is NI_ECALL or NI_DDA.
80s : If node is NI_ICAS1Sys01 or NI_ICAS1Sys02.

simplesect.title: Globals
simplesect.para: NI_ECALL - Contains ECALL node ID. NI_DDA - Contains DDa node ID VLAN_15s_TIMEOUT_TRESH NODE_20s_TIMEOUT_TRESH VLAN_80s_TIMEOUT_TRESH NODE_CAN_TIMEOUT_FAIL_VALUE NODE_CAN_TIMEOUT_FAIL_VALUE

simplesect.para: This function can be verified in following test: TEST_ErrGetNodeTimeoutTreshVal
